title: Boutique Adults-Only Retreat in Hawke’s Bay with Daily Breakfast & NZ$50 Dining Credit
description:
Indulge in an adults-only boutique escape in the heart of New Zealand’s Hawke’s Bay wine region with a stay at Hawthorne House, home to just four luxuriously appointed guest rooms that flow effortlessly onto covered verandas and into delightful country gardens. Conveniently located close to a plethora of lush vineyards, pristine beaches and gourmet restaurants, this luxury Edwardian villa, set among five hectares of country gardens, showcases the very best of the North Island’s beautiful landscape. Originally built as a private residence prior to being relocated to its current position in the late 1960s, this stunning Edwardian villa is one of the few places where you can experience the old-world charm and luxury of Hawke’s Bay with high-end service to match.

Throughout your stay, be sure to spend time hopping between the many wineries nearby, take a refreshing dip at the beautiful beaches, indulge your palate with regional delicacies, play a round of golf at Cape Kidnappers or hike along the trails at Te Mata Peak - unearth the best sights and experiences dotted across this gorgeous corner of the world.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Prepare for the day with a gourmet cooked and continental breakfast
- Make the most of NZ$50 dining and drinks credit per room to use at St Georges Restaurant or Deliciosa Restaurant
- Enjoy a welcome house wine, beer or soft drink with a selection of nibbles served on arrival
- Indulge in delicious gourmet in-room nibbles including savoury snacks, chocolates and peanuts
- Let the good times flow with a selection of wines and beers included in the in-room minibar
- Stay connected with included Wi-Fi

**Super-King Upgrade available:** Choose the Edwardian-influenced Super-King Room (Pango, Mawhero or Kikorangi Room) and enjoy a complimentary bottle of local Hawke's Bay wine.
offer_address: 1420 Railway Road South, Pakipaki, Hastings 4178, New Zealand

title: Luxurious Group Villa in One of New Zealand's Finest Wine Regions
description: Indulge in an intimate boutique villa escape in the heart of the North Island’s beautiful landscape and New Zealand’s world-renowned Hawke’s Bay wine region with a stay at Amuri Villas. Conveniently located close to a plethora of lush vineyards, pristine beaches and gourmet eateries, this luxury self-contained villa, set amongst two acres of beautiful country garden, will delight you with a one-time breakfast hamper filled with seasonal produce, a complimentary bottle of local, award-winning Clearview sparkling wine in-villa on arrival and guaranteed 12pm late checkout. Upgrades available.
